LanguageData.WitnessedDeathAllyInnocent.stages.0.desc: I saw one of my people die. I can't believe they're gone. I'll never speak to them again.
LanguageData.WitnessedDeathNonAllyInnocent.stages.0.d: I saw someone die. I saw the light in their eyes, snuffed out as they fell.
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecutedInnocent.stages.0.label: justified execution
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecutedInnocent.stages.0.descr: A guilty prisoner or guest was executed. It was justified, but I still can't abide the loss of life.
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecutedInnocent.stages.1.label: someone was euthanized
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecutedInnocent.stages.1.descr: A prisoner or guest was euthanized. It was humane, but still heartbreaking.
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecutedInnocent.stages.2.label: someone was executed
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecutedInnocent.stages.2.descr: A prisoner or guest was killed in cold blood. I can't believe this!
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecutedInnocent.stages.3.label: someone killed by organ harvest
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecutedInnocent.stages.3.descr: A prisoner or guest died because the colony took body parts from him. I'm livid!
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecutedInnocent.stages.0.de: A guilty colonist was executed. It was justified, but I still can't abide the loss of life.
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecutedInnocent.stages.1.de: A colonist was euthanized. It was humane, but still heartbreaking.
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecutedInnocent.stages.2.de: A colonist was killed in cold blood. I can't believe this!
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecutedInnocent.stages.3.de: A colonist died because someone took body parts from him. I'm livid!
One of our prisoners died despite being harmless. We have a duty to take care of our prisoners. If we wanted them dead, we could have at least conducted an orderly execution rather than permit that barbarism.
LanguageData.KnowColonistDiedInnocent.stages.0.label: colonist died
LanguageData.KnowColonistDiedInnocent.stages.0.descri: One of our people died. If only we'd done something differently...
LanguageData.KilledHumanlikeEnemyInnocent.stages.0.de: I killed someone attacking our colony. My hands are still shaking... I can't believe I survived.
LanguageData.KnowPrisonerSoldInnocent.stages.0.label: a prisoner was sold
LanguageData.KnowPrisonerSoldInnocent.stages.0.descri: This colony sold a prisoner into slavery. I can't believe we participate in that barbarism.
LanguageData.KnowGuestOrganHarvestedInnocent.stages.0: The colony took body parts from a guest or prisoner. It's unacceptable, breaking someone down for parts when they have no choice.
LanguageData.KnowColonistOrganHarvestedInnocent.stage: Someone took body parts from a colonist. It's unacceptable, breaking someone down for parts when they have no choice.
LanguageData.ReplacedPartInnocent.stages.0.label: installed an organ or body part
LanguageData.ReplacedPartInnocent.stages.0.descriptio: I gave someone a new organ or body part. I probably improved their quality of life! I'm so happy.
LanguageData.DoctorInnocent.stages.0.label: helped a patient
LanguageData.DoctorInnocent.stages.0.description: I love medicine. It gives you so many opportunities to help people.
LanguageData.RescuedInnocent.stages.0.label: saved someone
LanguageData.RescuedInnocent.stages.0.description: I rescued someone from near-death. No need to thank me, good deeds are their own reward.
LanguageData.FilledGraveInnocent.stages.0.label: buried someone
LanguageData.KilledPatientInnocent.stages.0.label: killed a patient
LanguageData.KilledPatientInnocent.stages.0.descripti: I killed one of my patients in surgery. It's all my fault... they should still be alive.
LanguageData.ColonistAbandonedInnocent.stages.0.label: colonist abandoned
LanguageData.ColonistAbandonedInnocent.stages.0.descr: We just left someone behind. I can't stop thinking about what might happen to them.
We left someone behind in such a way that there's almost no way they'll survive. How could we?
We left a prisoner behind in such a way that there's almost no way they'll survive. We have a responsibility to safeguard the people we imprison.
LanguageData.LostInnocence.stages.0.label: lost innocence
LanguageData.LostInnocence.stages.0.description: I saw a dead body. The cruelty in the world saddens me incredibly......
